price: 13. Tama mari gutqoh gutqumoonu waan ayró jahannam girâ fanah.
arabic: يَوۡمَ يُدَعُّونَ إِلَىٰ نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ دَعًّا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: yawma yudaʿʿūna ilā nāri jahannama daʿʿan
